entry.title: Cluedo: Classic Edition
entry.summary: Ultimate Detective Collection: HK$Â 188.00 â†’ HK$Â 148.00
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯

App å…§è³¼è²·é …ç›®

  • Ultimate Detective Collectionï¼šHK$Â 188.00 â†’ HK$Â 148.00 [HK$Â 148.00 ~ HK$Â 188.00]

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

THE ORIGINAL HASBRO BOARD GAME - Itâ€™s the classic murder mystery! Who did it? With what weapon? In which room? Thereâ€™s a high-risk party at the mansion and every guest is a suspect. Roll the dice, become a detective and let Cluedo begin! â€¢ A PREMIUM DIGITAL BOARD GAME - There are no ads, no pop-ups and no pay-to-win limits. Once you buy the app, thatâ€™s it: unlimited multiplayer fun for you and your family and nothing to stop you solving the crime! â€¢ A BRAIN TEASER - Test your detective skills. At the start of each game, Cluedo will take one suspect, one weapon, and one room from the deck, and deal the rest to the players. If you ask: â€œwas it Colonel Mustard with the Rope in the Drawing Roomâ€, a player holding the Colonel, the Rope or the Drawing Room must show you their card. Enter every room in search of answers! â€¢ CLUESHEET & HINT SYSTEM - Who committed murder?! Donâ€™t risk letting the criminal escape! Use your virtual cluesheet companion to make a note of the suspects, weapons and rooms you can eliminate. The ideal companion for every detective: cluesheet helps you make your deductions, perfect your strategy and solve the mystery. â€¢ FAMILY FRIENDLY - Itâ€™s the original family board game by Hasbro, suitable for all players 8 years and over. With no adverts or necessary in-app purchases itâ€™s multiplayer fun for kids and adults. With the whole board game on your mobile you can take Cluedo wherever you go! Roll the dice and solve the mystery! â€¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Put your brain to the test against a guest list of AI murder suspects, online or offline! Choose your character, choose your opponents and let no criminal escape the mansion! â€¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Play Cluedo with your friends and find out whoâ€™s guilty on mobile, PC or Nintendo Switch! Donâ€™t let distance stop your board game night. Play on the go, or curl up in an armchair and settle down for a night of crime and detective work, wherever you are! â€¢ 10 ADDITIONAL THEMES - Explore ten different themed boards with Cluedo's Ultimate Detectiveâ€™s Package. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether youâ€™re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sportâ€”and more! Key Features: Baseball Action Like Never Before: Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batterâ€™s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun! Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay: Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops! With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run. Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseballâ€”the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action!
